item.title: Video Player in Blazor
item.description: Video Player in Blazor This code provides a video player component in a Blazor application. It allows users to watch videos with controls and captions. The video player is customizable using the Plyr.io library. Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It enables full-stack development with .NET. Plyr.io: Plyr.io is a JavaScript library that provides a customizable video player with a modern UI.
